title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 458.6 - Eligibility for services
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 458.6 - Eligibility for services

State Regulations

The activities specified in section
485.3, 485.4 and
485.5
of this Part are available
only to persons who are in receipt of supplemental security income or home
relief and to persons with incomes which do not exceed 150 percent of the

Federal income official poverty line as defined and annually revised by the

Federal Office of Management and Budget. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
458.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
